title: It's not Resavska
content:
Hello there!

I have a friend who likes a lot this font. I couldn't tell him though which one it is. I've tried WhattheFont but the only good result that I have points me to ITC Resavska but this is not the case.

Here's the font. Hope you can help.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426051518im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2ue65xk_3631.jpg)
author: tezzutezzu

comments.content:
I think this is [Gentium](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426051518/http:/scripts.sil.org/cms/scripts/page.php?site_id=nrsi&item_id=Gentium), a free font by Victor Gaultney. The attached sample is from the Serif Font ID Guide.

- Mike Yanega

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426051518im_/http:/typophile.com/files/gentium_full_3932.gif)

I see Raph beat me to it.

- Mike Yanega
Thanks a lot guys! You made my day.
